Posts.EditableText:
I partially coded this game, mostly set it up in QDK, but I've encountered a strange error:(I;m using 3.12)

I have my object, (hole in the wall) the name of it is hole, in the back room of this tavern. But if I use any commands on it, (take, look, etc.) it replies to me with "I can't see anything called that here."
Posts.HTML:
I partially coded this game, mostly set it up in QDK, but I've encountered a strange error:(I;m using 3.12)

I have my object, (hole in the wall) the name of it is hole, in the back room of this tavern. But if I use any commands on it, (take, look, etc.) it replies to me with "I can't see anything called that here."

Posts.EditableText: are you using Typelib.qlb or Q3ext ? if so then be sure this object is set to be "regular" object, otherwise it won't work for regular command. You can also look at this thread : http://www.axeuk.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=42
Posts.HTML:
are you using Typelib.qlb or Q3ext ? if so then be sure this object is set to be "regular" object, otherwise it won't work for regular command.
You can also look at this thread :

http://www.axeuk.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=42
